comment:
* This class processes parse events for an exslt func:function element.
 * @xsl.usage internal

methods.name: public void startElement(StylesheetHandler handler, String uri, String localName, String rawName, Attributes attributes) throws SAXException
methods.comment:
* Start an ElemExsltFunction. Verify that it is top level and that it has a name attribute with a
   * namespace.

methods.name: protected void appendAndPush(StylesheetHandler handler, ElemTemplateElement elem) throws SAXException
public void endElement(StylesheetHandler handler, String uri, String localName, String rawName) throws SAXException
methods.comment: * End an ElemExsltFunction, and verify its validity.

methods.name: public void validate(ElemTemplateElement elem, StylesheetHandler handler) throws SAXException
methods.comment:
* Non-recursive traversal of FunctionElement tree based on TreeWalker to verify that
   * there are no literal result elements except within a func:result element and that
   * the func:result element does not contain any following siblings except xsl:fallback.

methodNames: public void startElement(StylesheetHandler handler, String uri, String localName, String rawName, Attributes attributes) throws SAXException
protected void appendAndPush(StylesheetHandler handler, ElemTemplateElement elem) throws SAXException
public void endElement(StylesheetHandler handler, String uri, String localName, String rawName) throws SAXException
public void validate(ElemTemplateElement elem, StylesheetHandler handler) throws SAXException
